Constants.Standards: City’s Noise Ordinance in Chapter 9.10 of the Municipal Code

Mandatory: May not be located in front, rear, or interior-side yards
Optional: Planning Dept. can waive insulation and housing requirement
Conditional logic: If equipment is located in buildable area and a combination of noise specifications, location, and/or other screening or buffering will assure compliance
Dependencies: Compliance with City’s Noise Ordinance at the nearest lot line

Exceptions.Explicit deviations: Planning Dept. can waive insulation and housing requirement
Exceptions.Alternatives: Combination of noise specifications, location, and/or other screening or buffering

Hierarchical: General rules apply to all service equipment
Specific conditions for street-side yard encroachment
Cross-references: Figure 27 C for street-side yard encroachment
Logical dependencies: Compliance with City’s Noise Ordinance depends on location and noise specifications
